person.persName: William S. Stone (Daviess County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of William Stone. Married to Susan M. Stone. Farmer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned seventeen enslaved persons in Daviess County in 1850. Farmer in Daviess County in 1860. Employed Joseph W. Slaughter and William Adams as laborers in Daviess County in 1860. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Daviess County in 1860.
